English: <color=red>WARNING: Ventilation system malfunction detected. Requires a manual restart at a terminal in</color> <color=orange>ZONE 123</color>
Description:
Don't localize ZONE 123.
A text string that appears on screen when the player attempts to open a door which is locked due to an emergency lockdown. Don't alter the RichText tags.

French.Translation: <color=red>AVERTISSEMENT : dysfonctionnement du système de ventilation détecté. Redémarrage manuel requis sur un terminal dans la<color=red> <color=orange>ZONE 123</color>.

Italian.Translation: <color=red>ATTENZIONE: rilevata anomalia sistema di ventilazione. Richiesto riavvio manuale su terminale nella</color> <color=orange>ZONE 123</color>

German.Translation: <color=red>WARNUNG: Fehlfunktion im Belüftungssystem erkannt. Manueller Neustart an einem Terminal in<color=red> <color=orange>ZONE 123</color> erforderlich.

Spanish.Translation: <color=red>ADVERTENCIA: Fallo en el sistema de ventilación detectado. Debe reiniciarse manualmente en una terminal de la <color=red><color=orange>ZONE 123</color>.

Russian.Translation: <color=red>ВНИМАНИЕ! Обнаружена неполадка в системе вентиляции. Требуется ручная перезагрузка на терминале в</color> <color=orange>ZONE 123</color>.

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: <color=red>AVISO: Falha no sistema de ventilação detectada. Um reinício manual é necessário em um terminal da</color> <color=orange>ZONE 123</color>.

Polish.Translation: <color=red>OSTRZEŻENIE: wykryto awarię systemu wentylacyjnego. Wymagane ponowne ręczne uruchomienie w terminalu w<color=red> <color=orange>strefie 123 [ZONE_123]</color>.

Japanese.Translation: <color=red>警告：換気システムの異常を検知。</color><color=orange>ZONE 123</color>の端末で手動再起動が必要

Korean.Translation: <color=red>경고: 환기 시스템 고장 탐지. </color> <color=orange>ZONE 123</color> 터미널에서 수동 재시작이 필요합니다

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: <color=red>警告：偵測到通風系統故障。需要在</color><color=orange>ZONE 123</color>的終端手動重啟

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: <color=red>警告：检测到通风系统故障，需要在</color><color=orange>ZONE 123</color>的终端上手动重启

name: LevelLayoutData.ProgressionPuzzle.CustomText5_C2
